name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, start Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, launch Haiku Reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader is an elegant and user-friendly Alexa skill that allows you to explore and enjoy beautiful haikus effortlessly. To use this skill, ensure you have an Alexa-enabled device, such as an Echo or Echo Dot, and that your Alexa account is set to English.

Once activated, you can easily request daily haikus and immerse yourself in a curated selection of both classic and contemporary poetry. Simply say, "Alexa, open Haiku Reader" to get started. You will receive a daily dose of calming and inspiring haikus, with each session designed to offer moments of reflection and tranquility.

Note that "Haiku Reader" requires an internet connection and is available to users in supported regions where Alexa services are active. Enjoy a seamless experience with no additional setup beyond enabling the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
